title: Primitive Planters CVS017 17 in. Clear Plastic Saucer - Pack of 2525
description: These plant pot saucers help you catch water from the plant pot drainage hole. BPA Free & Recyclable Material - Not only these dishes can be used for plant pots but they also can be used for holder candies and other small items. Crystal clear plastic - You're able to see water level through these clear plastic flower pot saucers. You can decorate the plant drip tray with colorful pebbles. They are dishwasher safe too. All of our plant trays/saucers are made in the USA using 95% recycled high impact polypropylene which is a strong plastic that is easy to clean. Plant saucers are high quality plant pots saucers which are environmentally friendly, recyclable and a must to protect furniture and floors becoming stained from overwatering.
